post.author: Admin
post.title: Nominating Committee, Tax Forms and Bylaws
post.description:
Dear North Royalton High School Band Booster Members,
Our Nominating Committee was formed at last
post.content:
Dear North Royalton High School Band Booster Members,

Our Nominating Committee was formed at last night’s meeting. If you are interested in filling an officer position next year or have any questions, please contact Shirley Berish at saberish@hotmail.com.

Our tax return for the fiscal year 2014 and our bylaws can be found on our website on the Booster Documents page. We are notifying you of this as per our booster rules.

Thanks,

Becky Humes
Band Booster Corresponding Secretary
